meanings.definition: Superlative form of bad, meaning the most severe or serious.
meanings.sent1: She was the baddest student in the class, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent2: The storm last night was the baddest we've seen in years.
meanings.sent3: Even the baddest of storms couldn't stop the determined hiker.
meanings.sent4: His temper was like the baddest thunder, loud and frightening.
meanings.sent5: The baddest punishment for him was having to apologize in front of everyone.

meanings.definition: Informal slang term meaning the best or most impressive.
meanings.sent1: That new movie is the baddest one I've ever seen!
meanings.sent2: She's the baddest dancer in the whole group.
meanings.sent3: The baddest cake at the party was gone in minutes.
meanings.sent4: His car was the baddest on the block, turning heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The baddest moment of the concert was when the singer jumped into the crowd.
